attributes.action: Please scrap council tax for OAP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please scrap the council tax for Pensioners who have worked hard all there lives and added to the prosperity of this country. Having bought their own homes they should be rewarded for their efforts by having the council tax totally scrapped please.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
